body_html:
Hello, I am working refactoring the android demo to work with the camera api1 but I am having troubles with the tracker detector(DetectorActivity.java around line 250)

 final Plane[] planes = image.getPlanes();
      fillBytes(planes, yuvBytes);

      tracker.onFrame(
          previewWidth,
          previewHeight,
          planes[0].getRowStride(),
          sensorOrientation,
          yuvBytes[0],
          timestamp);
trackingOverlay.postInvalidate();

that object requires a rowStride wich is provided by the camera api 2 Image object, but the camera api1 just provides a simple byte[] public void onPreviewFrame(final byte[] bytes, final Camera camera)
Any ideas how can I code that section fore the camera api1?
body:
Hello, I am working refactoring the android demo to work with the camera api1 but I am having troubles with the tracker detector(DetectorActivity.java around line 250) 
```
 final Plane[] planes = image.getPlanes();
      fillBytes(planes, yuvBytes);

      tracker.onFrame(
          previewWidth,
          previewHeight,
          planes[0].getRowStride(),
          sensorOrientation,
          yuvBytes[0],
          timestamp);
trackingOverlay.postInvalidate();
```
that object requires a rowStride wich is provided by the camera api 2 Image object, but  the camera api1 just provides a simple byte[] `public void onPreviewFrame(final byte[] bytes, final Camera camera) `
Any ideas how can I code that section fore the camera api1?
